100011 00000 00001 0000 0000 0010 0000
8C010020
opcode rs    rt    offset //LW r[1] = MEM(rs+offset(32)) result r[1]= 0000000C

100011 00000 00010 0000 0000 0010 0100
8C020024
opcode rs    rt    offset //LW r[2] = MEM(rs+offset(36)) result r[2]= 0000000C

000000 00001 00010 00011 00000 100001
0000 0000 0010 0010 0001 1000 0010 0001
00221821
opcode rs    rt    offset //ADDU r[3] = r[1] + r[2] // r[3]= 18

000000 00011 00000 11111 00000 001001
0000 0000 0110 0000 1111 1000 0000 1001
0060F809
opcode Offset //JALR to MEM[24] 

000000 00001 00011 00011 00000 100001
0000 0000 0010 0011 0001 1000 0010 0001
00231821
opcode rs    rt    offset //ADDU r[3] = r[1] + r[3]

00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
//filler instruction

101011 00000 11111 0000 0000 0010 1000
AC1F0028
opcode rs    rt    offset //SW MEM(rs+offset(40)) = r[31] 

101011 00000 00011 0000 0000 0010 1100
AC03002C
opcode rs    rt    offset //SW MEM(rs+offset(44)) = r[3]
